member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties
member.summary: Specifies the identifiers of the metadata items in an 8BIMResolutionInfo block.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoPString
member.summary: [VT_LPSTR] A name that identifies the 8BIM block.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoHResolution
member.summary: [VT_UI4] The horizontal resolution of the image.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoHResolutionUnit
member.summary: [VT_UI2] The units that the horizontal resolution is specified in; a 1 indicates pixels per inch and a 2 indicates pixels per centimeter.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoWidthUnit
member.summary: [VT_UI2] The units that the image width is specified in; a 1 indicates inches, a 2 indicates centimeters, a 3 indicates points, a 4 specifies picas, and a 5 specifies columns.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoVResolution
member.summary: [VT_UI4] The vertical resolution of the image.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoVResolutionUnit
member.summary: [VT_UI2] The units that the vertical resolution is specified in; a 1 indicates pixels per inch and a 2 indicates pixels per centimeter.

member.name: WIC8BIMResolutionInfoProperties.WIC8BIMResolutionInfoHeightUnit
member.summary: [VT_UI2] The units that the image height is specified in; a 1 indicates inches, a 2 indicates centimeters, a 3 indicates points, a 4 specifies picas, and a 5 specifies columns.
